subject: Television
Telephones and Telecommunications
Athletics and Sports
Cable Television
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: The newly created Big Ten Network, which the conference vows will satiate its universities’ fans and alumni, is the source of a dispute between the conference and Comcast.
snippet: The newly created Big Ten Network, which the conference vows will satiate its universities’ fans and alumni, is the source of a dispute between the conference and Comcast.
